name: Bone Train
description:
The road out of hell is dangerous, even more so with a train full of innocents. What choices will you make to make it out of hell in one piece?

All aboard the bone train! ride the shifting tracks from hell to the gates of heaven, make sure you have enough fuel to make the journey, and keep your passengers safe from sinners.  

Ido Eliakim - Art & Design

Ofek Mor - Art & Design 

Tamir Sagi - Techincal development

Elad Maman - Technical development

Music by Yuval Ilani
